TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NumberPicker extends Android.Widget.LinearLayout

Docs.summary: A widget that enables the user to select a number from a predefined range.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.MaxValue : int with get, set
public virtual int MaxValue { get; set; }

Docs.param: The max value inclusive. Note: The length of the displayed values array set via #setDisplayedValues(String[]) must be equal to the range of selectable numbers which is equal to #getMaxValue() - #getMinValue() + 1.
Docs.summary: Returns the max value of the picker. -or- Sets the max value of the picker.

Property setter documentation:

MemberSignature.Value: member this.MinValue : int with get, set
public virtual int MinValue { get; set; }

Docs.param: The min value inclusive. Note: The length of the displayed values array set via #setDisplayedValues(String[]) must be equal to the range of selectable numbers which is equal to #getMaxValue() - #getMinValue() + 1.
Docs.summary: Returns the min value of the picker. -or- Sets the min value of the picker.

Docs.summary: Sets the speed at which the numbers be incremented and decremented when the up and down buttons are long pressed respectively.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.WrapSelectorWheel : bool with get, set
public virtual bool WrapSelectorWheel { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Gets whether the selector wheel wraps when reaching the min/max value. -or- Sets whether the selector wheel shown during flinging/scrolling should wrap around the NumberPicker#getMinValue() and NumberPicker#getMaxValue() values.
Docs.value: True if the selector wheel wraps.
